title: Funding for travelling community accommodation cut 93% in past 7 years – Mac Lochlainn (Sinn ...
text: ( Source : Sinn Féin ) 14 October , 2015 - by Pádraig Mac Lochlainn TD Sinn Féin spokesperson on Equality Pádraig Mac Lochlainn TD raised the Carrickmines tragedy during Leaders' Questions, highlighting huge cuts to funding for accommodating
